title: Waves (feat. October London)
lyrics:
Why you show me love like that?
Show me love babe, show me love babe
Why you kissin' up like that?
Kissin' up babe, kissin' up babe
You got a body that girls would die for, a smile the sun shines for

The type I might wife, call you my ride or die, go Bonnie and Clyde for

I didn't know you could love like that, move your hips like that

You know, you know, that turns me on



Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave, no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more

Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more and more



Baby can we run it back

Run it back babe, run it back babe

Ooh, don't you run it like that

Run like that, run like that



You got a body that girls would die for, a smile the sun shines for

The type I might wife, call you my ride or die, go Bonnie and Clyde for

I didn't know you could love like that, move your hips like that

You know, you know, that turns me on



Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more

Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more and more



Want them girl a sexy, I want to be close to you immensely

Come in my bedroom, undress me, now rub me down girl, caress me

Radio play in Paris, overlookin' the terrace

Baby blushin', she so embarrased

Got her a ring full of karats

Baguettes, pearls, and diamonds too

Treat ya right, that's what a wise man do

A bird's eye view, wit' a art from the Louvre

Kissin' on my body, sparks at the moon

Barks at the moon, like a thief in the night

Step to my left, so we keepin' it right

Keepin' it tight, livin' the life

Lovin' the night, huggin' ya tight

Ya need a Crip cuz in ya life

And that's me, ooh-wee, OG Snoopy

Let's take a walk in the sand, baby, gimme yo' hand



Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more and more



Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more and more



Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more and more



Let me dive down to your ocean floor

Touch you from head to toe

Baby, ride that wave no surfboard

Don't stop, no, no, give me more and more
